entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this morning. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
